shortdesc.ph: Updates the channels for media stream relay.

p.codeblock: public abstract int updateChannelMediaRelayEx( ChannelMediaRelayConfiguration channelMediaRelayConfiguration, RtcConnection connection);
virtual int updateChannelMediaRelayEx(const ChannelMediaRelayConfiguration& configuration, const RtcConnection& connection) = 0;
public abstract int UpdateChannelMediaRelayEx(ChannelMediaRelayConfiguration configuration, RtcConnection connection);

section.p: After the media relay starts, if you want to relay the media stream to more channels, or leave the current relay channel, you can call the updateChannelMediaRelay method.
After a successful method call, the SDK triggers the callback with the (7) state code.
section.note: Call the method after successfully calling the method and receiving (, ); otherwise, the method call fails.

plentry.pd: The configuration of the media stream relay. See .
